name: Hidden Mistakes: Arcade
description:
Hidden Mistakes : Arcade is a game that's supposed to be the first of a new serie called Hidden Mistakes . This page is about the Prototype of Hidden Mistakes : Arcade . 

New

  •  entities 
  •  settings 

will be added soon . 

If you would like to support this project , you can contact me the developer via instagram : @pybhad
